# [Interview #1084: Ask the Author: Brandon Sanderson, Entry #44](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1084#44)

#### Question

Were the aliens in Sixth of the Dusk from the Mistborn planet?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO. :)

All I've said is that they're from a planet you've seen/heard of before.
